multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main drawback of Hard-Decision Forward Error Correction (HD-FEC) compared to soft-decision FEC?
What is the purpose of "anchor codewords" in the proposed decoding algorithm?
choices: To identify and correct all miscorrected codewords
To reduce the overall decoding complexity
To provide a reference for detecting inconsistencies caused by miscorrections
To enable parallel processing of component codes

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the effect of increasing the value of the conflict threshold \'T\' in the proposed algorithm?
choices: It increases the tolerance for miscorrections in anchor codewords.
It reduces the decoding complexity by limiting the number of checked conflicts.
It improves the error floor performance by reducing false backtracking.
It has negligible impact on the overall decoding performance.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is one significant advantage of iterative HD decoding of staircase codes compared to message-passing decoding of LDPC codes?
choices: Significantly reduced decoder data flow requirement
